description: As Baba Yaga, use a brewed potion that is 5 of the same type of ingredient.

description: As Baba Yaga, gain 50 stacks on your items in a single game, utilizing the power from your Cabin.

description: As Tsukuyomi dash through 12 targets using Piercing Moonlight.
